Invocation Name: smart access
Developer Terms of Use
des: "Ask Alexa to Lock or Unlock your Smart Furniture such as Storage Cabinet, Kitchen Drawer, or wherever else your Smart Access locking systems are installed. A built in security feature auto-relocks after a preset time."
